programlisting:
roleARN := flag.String("r", "", "The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume") sessionName := flag.String("s", "", "A unique identifier for the session")
if *roleARN == "" || *sessionName == "" { fmt.Println("You must supply a role ARN and session name") fmt.Println("-r ROLE-ARN -S SESSION-NAME") return }
